name: The Heart Of The Moving Dungeon
name_original: The Heart Of The Moving Dungeon
description:
In The Heart Of The Moving Dungeon you set out, equip with your trusty throwing knifes, to finally defeat the Heart Of The Moving Dungeon and bring back prosperity to the Sunken Valley.

Move through an still standing dungeon, figure out the best way to move through this hostile environment, keep track of upgrade positions and defeat the Heart Of The Dungeon.
